desc: Life is too short to give a fuck what anyone thinks! A store for people who are a boss ass bitch , but also a free spirit claiming their happiness and looking fabulous doing it! From classy, to trashy and a little sass assy.

layout.text: BE WILD, BE FREE BE LIKE LIZERELLA

Life is too short to give a fuck what anyone thinks! Live everyday to the fullest, Be a Boss Bitch, Get money, Set goals , Be Free, Be Happy, Manifest your dreams, Be who ever you fuckin want to be!
Shop with your soul.....
Paint your canvas!
